TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ReliableMessagingVersion extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Contains the settings for the supported versions of the WS-ReliableMessaging protocol. This is an abstract class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks There are currently two versions of the WS-ReliableMessaging protocol supported by [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]: WS-ReliableMessaging1.1 and WS-ReliableMessagingFebruary2005. WS-ReliableMessaging1.1 is returned by <xref:System.ServiceModel.ReliableMessagingVersion.WSReliableMessaging11%2A> and WS-ReliableMessagingFebruary2005 is returned by <xref:System.ServiceModel.ReliableMessagingVersion.WSReliableMessagingFebruary2005%2A>. The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ReliableMessagingVersion.Default%2A> version is WS-ReliableMessagingFebruary2005.

Docs.summary: Returns the default version of WS-ReliableMessaging protocol.
Docs.value: An instance derived from that represents the default version of the WS-ReliableMessaging protocol. The default version is WS-ReliableMessagingFebruary2005.

Docs.summary: Gets version 1.1 of the WS-ReliableMessaging protocol.
Docs.value: An instance derived from that represents the WS-ReliableMessaging1.1 version.

Docs.summary: Gets the February 2005 version of the WS-ReliableMessaging protocol.
Docs.value: An instance derived from that represents the WS-ReliableMessagingFebruary2005 version.
